course_description: The class objective is to develop financial decision-making skills in a variety of different settings.  We will develop core modern finance skills as part of the tool-kit and apply the concepts to a variety of different real-world industry verticals.  The class is very applied in nature.There will be field-work classes (formal lecture substituted by library, internet research) that will require you to learn about industry verticals.
